content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

The Tiber Sofa Bed is one of our cheapest sofa beds, however this does not mean the quality is any less! 

Available in a choice of faux leathers and wood stains as well as fabrics to complete the look of your room.

This product comes with a 2 year guarantee.
